resources.string: You can only select up to %1$d image(s)
Only the first %1$d image(s) selected will be taken.
The maximumImagesCount:%1$d is greater than the device's max limit of images that can be selected from the MediaStore: %2$d. Maximum number of images that can be selected is: %2$d
Image size limit is %1$dMB\nVideo size limit is %2$dMB
Media(s) above max limit not selected
